heading: Planning and Scheduling
content: Diversdesk presents you industry's most flexible planner, offering multi-booking, multi-activity, and cross-location scheduling capabilities. Quickly allocate customers with just a few clicks, ensuring smooth operations and satisfied clients.

heading: Paperless Onboarding
content: With Diversdesk your business can operate 100% paperless. Use our embedded Diver Medical forms and official waivers from your certification organization, or create custom waivers from scratch. Secure, professional, and environmentally friendly.
